level.heading: DEFINITIONS (ยง 29-57A99) When used in this chapter, the following terms and phrases shall have theollowing meanings: Immigrant child- Any child who is ineligible for Medicaid by virtue of thehild’s immigration status. Medical Assistance- Health care services provided by a health maintenancerganization (HMO) in accordance with the terms of a contract between theistrict government and the HMO to provide managed care health services on aapitated basis.
